why the death mail? Like this is good and at the end I get it but the beginning why, is it like everyone else likes her and because the 2 of them fight he gets death threats? Or is it something else? When did I start analyzing and liking doujin plot more than the porn aspect it self?

I think the only thing I need mostly is kind of like a summary of their back story, cause the story just kind of skipped parts like: "Oh, they wish to have a bf/gf; Oh, they're going to their lockers together; Oh, he has death mails in his locker cause he talks and fights with her. Now they're walking home together and got interrupted by someone and then Bam! They're at their house, now directly banging"

Overall still pretty wholesome though ngl
